episodes.description: Cultivating Rice and Community: Features one young couple who've been growing rice with "natural cultivation" method in the city of Hakui on the Noto Peninsula.
episodes.subtitle: Cultivating Rice and Community
episodes.title: SPIRIT OF JAPAN

episodes.description: Bell Peppers that Pack a Punch: Features one young couple living in Okinawa Prefecture, growing a distinctive kind of bell pepper that's larger and sweeter than other varieties.
episodes.subtitle: Bell Peppers that Pack a Punch
episodes.title: SPIRIT OF JAPAN
